org.icefaces.ace.component.datatable

Class AutoAdjustRenderedColspan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icefaces.ace.component.datatable.AutoAdjustRenderedColspan

  • public class AutoAdjustRenderedColspan
extends java.lang.Object
    If a header ColumnGroup is used, with multiple row(s), there can be a hierarchy of header columns, where a parent with its colspan can stretch over several child ones below. In that case, if the parent ceases to be rendered, then none of the children or offspring should be rendered. Likewise, if every child is not rendered, then the parent should nt be either. And if several, but not all, children are not rendered, then the parent should be rendered, but have a lesser colspan to account for only rendering over the remaining columns. This makes all of these necessary adjustments.
